[00:00.10]After The Afterparty (派对过后) - Charli XCX (查莉 XCX)/Lil Yachty
[00:00.20]Written by：T.E. Hermansen/Sophie/Mikkel S. Eriksen/Fred Gibson/Charli XCX
[00:00.30]Charli XCX：
[00:00.35]After the after the party we're gonna keep it going
[00:04.69]
[00:05.23]We're gonna rip it up the neighbours might complain
[00:09.59]
[00:12.12]I think it's almost 4am but baby I'm still feeling just fine
[00:16.06]
[00:17.25]Ice all up in a plastic cup and I'ma keep on sipping all night yeah
[00:21.66]
[00:22.47]I might a kissed a thousand lips but maybe that's just all in my mind
[00:26.41]
[00:27.54]Some people never understand the way we live but we're living life
[00:31.75]
[00:32.51]Uh huh hey uh huh Monday to Sunday it's never too late
[00:38.14]So everyone say we don't wanna stop
[00:40.44]
[00:41.39]'Cause after the afterparty we're gonna keep it goin'
[00:45.89]
[00:46.51]We're gonna rip it up the neighbours might complain
[00:50.95]
[00:51.68]'Cause after the afterparty we're gonna stay 'til morning
[00:56.18]
[00:56.81]Then when the time is up we'll do it all again
[01:00.74]

[01:07.77]We're all in love
[01:09.03]
[01:10.51]We're all in love
[01:11.66]
[01:14.00]I'm hangin' on my best friend's couch and my clothes are all on the floor
[01:17.99]
[01:19.10]I got glitter in my underwear like it was studio 54 yeah
[01:23.58]
[01:24.35]I can't remember why I love it but I need it baby clap
[01:26.82]Bring on the encore
[01:28.31]
[01:29.07]Let's pour another drink the glasses go
[01:31.51]Yeah we're always up for one more
[01:33.65]
[01:34.44]Uh huh hey uh huh Monday to Sunday it's never too late
[01:40.10]So everyone say we don't wanna stop
[01:42.25]
[01:43.29]'Cause after the afterparty we're gonna keep it goin'
[01:47.84]
[01:48.46]We're gonna rip it up the neighbors might complain
[01:52.91]
[01:53.70]'Cause after the afterparty afterparty
[01:56.22]We're gonna stay 'til mornin' stay 'til morning
[01:58.96]Then when the time is up we'll do it all again oh yeah
[02:04.03]
[02:05.00]Lil Yachty：
[02:05.25]The party just ended but I'm not done with you
[02:07.72]My folks are out of town we got a crib with a view
[02:10.37]Come over bring a couple friends I keep mine with me
[02:13.11]Shout out to Whitney she was so wicked
[02:15.68]The party was so crazy the party was so crazy
[02:20.20]
[02:20.73]Tomorrow I'll be lazy but I'll spend it with you baby
[02:25.00]Charli XCX：
[02:25.00]
[02:25.96]Monday to Sunday doing it our way
[02:28.73]Riri on replay cheers to the weekday
[02:31.23]We're all in we're all in love yeah

data.trans:
[ti:After The Afterparty]
[ar:Charli XCX/Lil Yachty]
[al:After The Afterparty]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.10]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.20]//
[00:00.30]//
[00:00.35]派对结束后 我们继续派对余兴
[00:04.69]
[00:05.23]我们要尽情疯 或许邻居们会有所抱怨
[00:09.59]
[00:12.12]大概是凌晨四点 而宝贝我还在兴头上
[00:16.06]
[00:17.25]杯中的冰块都化了 整夜我仍喝不停
[00:21.66]
[00:22.47]搞不好我都热吻过上千次 不过都是我的想象而已
[00:26.41]
[00:27.54]有人无法理解我们的生活方式 但我们活得很好
[00:31.75]
[00:32.51]从周一到周日 绝不会太晚
[00:38.14]所以我们绝不会停下
[00:40.44]
[00:41.39]因为派对结束后 我们继续派对余兴
[00:45.89]
[00:46.51]我们要尽情疯 或许邻居们会有所抱怨
[00:50.95]
[00:51.68]因为派对结束后 我们会继续派对余兴 嗨到天明
[00:56.18]
[00:56.81]夜已尽时 我们再嗨一次
[01:00.74]
[01:02.52]//
[01:07.77]我们沉醉爱河
[01:09.03]
[01:10.51]我们沉醉爱河
[01:11.66]
[01:14.00]我在闺蜜的沙发上跳个不停 到处散落着我的衣服
[01:17.99]
[01:19.10]我的内衣星光闪耀 像是置身于百老汇的星光大道
[01:23.58]
[01:24.35]我已记不清为何我就爱这样 但我需要你的掌声宝贝
[01:26.82]再来一次
[01:28.31]
[01:29.07]再倒杯喝的 干杯吧
[01:31.51]是啊 我们要再嗨一夜
[01:33.65]

[01:40.10]所以我们绝不会停下

[01:56.22]我们会继续派对余兴 嗨到天明
[01:58.96]夜已尽时 我们再嗨一次
[02:04.03]
[02:05.00]//
[02:05.25]派对已经结束 但你我之间还未终结
[02:07.72]我弟兄们早已离开 而我们找了个风景超好的房间
[02:10.37]来吧 找帮朋友 我会让你始终在我身边
[02:13.11]大声叫Whitney吧 她已经喝蒙了
[02:15.68]这派对太疯狂 太疯狂
[02:20.20]
[02:20.73]明天我一定会很懒散 但我一定要跟你在一起
[02:25.00]//
[02:25.00]
